content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Paterson", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We serve individuals and families in need residing in Bellair, Elmwood Park,  Mountain View, North Haledon, , Prospect Park, and West Paterson. (additional)\nWill be closed for new applicants till January 7th.", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/new-jersey/paterson/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "541 West Broadway #545", "address_2": null, "city": " Paterson", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07522", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9305959, "longitude": -74.1912274}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 790-4817", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
